vars <- map_chr(.x = seq(1,10, by = 1), ~ paste0('v_', .x))




data_all <- tibble(variable = vars, population_value = pop_vals) %>% 
  mutate(pair_id = seq(1,100, by = 1) %>% list) %>% unnest(pair_id) %>% 
  rowwise %>% 
  mutate(pair_effect = rnorm(1, population_value, 1)) %>% 
  mutate(trail = seq(1,10, by = 1) %>% list) %>% unnest(trail) %>%
  rowwise %>% 
  mutate(effect = rnorm(1, pair_effect, 0.6))
